text: @Johnincarlisle Hi John, maybe worth letting @CumbriaCC  know about other tech available which is a lot cleaner  👉  @eqtec . It's not good at all having an incinerator near to a school !! @PHE_uk @EnvAgency should investigate.

@lincsrivers @LincsLive @NorthKestevenDC @theriverstrust @HeritageFundUK @NEEastMidlands @EnvAgencyMids @HeritageFundM_E @thelincolnite Big congratulations! The mammoth effort required to do the application has been rewarded. Very pleased for you!

@EnvAgencyMids @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @MalvernHills_DC @worcscc @hbaldwin @ludlowtenbury @ShropshireStar @worcesternews @WorcsLive Why are there no natural flood management solutions being used? Concrete flood defences increase the flow of water and send the problem further downstream. Leaky dams, flood plains and introduction of Beavers would provide a natural solution.
@BeFloodReady @CornwallCouncil @EnvAgencySW @DevonCC @Torbay_Council @plymouthcc @IoSCouncil Nice @BSIKitemark air vent and door barrier

All I want for Christmas is a mains power connection at Ilfracombe! Following the excellent work of @EnvAgencySW @DCfieldteamsEA in the summer to get the site built the cherry on the top- mains power to supply the flow measurement equipment for #floodwarnings. Getting there!! https://t.co/FUq3VmNGOE

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.
